sources.title: The Night That Panicked America
sources.description: Title: The Night That Panicked America Summary: On October 30, 1938, Orson Welles 's radio play "The War of the Worlds" accidentally provokes mass panic. Directed by: Joseph Sargent Actors: Vic Morrow, Cliff De Young, Michael Constantine Production Company: Paramount Television Release Date: TV Movie 31 October 1975 Aspect Ratio: 1.33 : 1 The true story of the night that

metadata.Plot: On October 30, 1938, Orson Welles's radio play "The War of the Worlds" accidentally provokes mass panic.
metadata.Writer: Nicholas Meyer, Anthony Wilson, Howard Koch
metadata.Actors: Vic Morrow, Cliff De Young, Michael Constantine
metadata.Awards: Won 1 Primetime Emmy. 1 win & 3 nominations total
